items.sentence: When I got home, I realized one of my suitcases had disappeared.
Tom realized Mary wasn't paying attention to what he was saying.
Tom asked Mary what the word meant, but she didn't know, either.
Tom had a massive crush on the girl next door when he was a kid.
Tom watched in silence as Mary poured the wine into the glasses.
Mary is the only girl who said she was interested in doing that.
Tom had a tooth pulled out the last time he went to the dentist.
I don't think that Tom knows what time Mary got home last night.
That doesn't mean we have to continue doing things the same way.
Tom stayed in Boston for a few days and then he flew to Chicago.
